text: a antyasamayam nannalkk vannettukayillenn satyanisedhikal parannuni parayuka: alla, enre raksitavine tanneyana, at ninnalkk vannettuka tanne ceyyum. adrsyakaryannal ariyunnavanaya (raksitavâ€Œ). akasannalilakatte bhumiyilakatte oru anuvinre tukkamullatea atinekkal cerutea valutea aya yateannum avanil ninn marann peakukayilla. spastamaya oru rekhayil ulpetattatayi yateannumilla
